about_the_game:
GameMaker
Unlimited access to the IDE (integrated development environment) and learning materials.

GXC Export
Export your game to the GXC and publish your game to the fast growing Opera GX audience of more than 10 million gamers.

Desktop Exports
Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms exports.

Web Export
HTML5 platform export.

Mobile Exports
iOS, Android, Amazon Fire, Android TV, and tvOS platforms exports.

Console Exports*
Export games to PlayStation 4 and 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch platforms exports.

*In order to access console export capabilities, you will need to be a registered developer for the selected platform.
detailed_description:
GameMaker
Unlimited access to the IDE (integrated development environment) and learning materials.

GXC Export
Export your game to the GXC and publish your game to the fast growing Opera GX audience of more than 10 million gamers.

Desktop Exports
Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms exports.

Web Export
HTML5 platform export.

Mobile Exports
iOS, Android, Amazon Fire, Android TV, and tvOS platforms exports.

Console Exports*
Export games to PlayStation 4 and 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch platforms exports.

*In order to access console export capabilities, you will need to be a registered developer for the selected platform.
drm_notice:
YoYo Games
3 different computers (with unlimited re-activations on each one) machine activation limit

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 Mojave
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Catalina
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

name: GameMaker Enterprise

package_groups.description: To be billed on a recurring basis.
package_groups.name: subscriptions

subs.option_description: $79.99 at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at $79.99.
$799.99 at checkout, auto-renewed every 12 month(s) at $799.99.

package_groups.title: Buy GameMaker Enterprise Subscription Plan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

price_overview.recurring_sub_desc: $79.99 at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at $79.99.

short_description: Windows, Mac, Linux, HTML5, iOS, Android, PlayStation 4 and 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch Exports for GameMaker
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish
